definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

pinyin: re4 he2 ju4 bian4 fan3 ying4

sentences.english: A hydrogen bomb has a built-in atomic bomb, which is needed to trigger the fusion reaction.
sentences.chinese: 氫彈內置了一顆原子彈，用於觸發聚變反應。

sentences.english: This should, in turn, cause more fusion reactions until the fuel runs out.
sentences.chinese: 這應當依次導致更多的聚變反應，直到燃料耗盡。

sentences.english: Every fusion reaction devours exactly one tritium ion and produces exactly one neutron.
sentences.chinese: 每一個聚變反應會耗一個氚核並只產生一箇中子。
